code: import"./App.css";import{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import Player from"./logic/Player";import Enemy from"./logic/Enemy.js";import BulletController from"./logic/BulletController.js";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var canvas=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){var _canvas$current;var ctx=(_canvas$current=canvas.current)===null||_canvas$current===void 0?void 0:_canvas$current.getContext("2d");canvas.width=550;canvas.height=600;var bulletController=new BulletController(canvas);var player=new Player(canvas.width/2.2,canvas.height/1.3,bulletController);var enemies=[new Enemy(50,20,"green",5),new Enemy(150,20,"red",5),new Enemy(250,20,"gold",2),new Enemy(350,20,"green",2),new Enemy(450,20,"gold",10),new Enemy(50,100,"green",5),new Enemy(150,100,"red",5),new Enemy(250,100,"gold",2),new Enemy(350,100,"green",2),new Enemy(450,100,"gold",20)];function gameLoop(){setCommonStyle();ctx.fillStyle="black";ctx.fillRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);bulletController.draw(ctx);player.draw(ctx);enemies.forEach(function(enemy){if(bulletController.collideWith(enemy)){if(enemy.health<=0){var index=enemies.indexOf(enemy);enemies.splice(index,1);}}else{enemy.draw(ctx);}});}function setCommonStyle(){ctx.shadowColor="#d53";ctx.shadowBlur=20;ctx.lineJoin="bevel";ctx.lineWidth=5;}var intt=setInterval(gameLoop,1000/60);return function(){clearInterval(intt);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shooting Bullets"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Move"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Arrow Keys"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Shoot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Space bar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvas,width:550,height:600})]});}export default App;
